cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to an invalid hex format '0xZZZ' will cause parsing failure and prevent gNB initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 200 (valid range up to 106 for band 78) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 200（band 78 的有效範圍最多為 106）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止小區設置。
